question: 連覇
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>take along</kanji> your <kanji>leadership</kanji> over and over, you're on a <vocabulary>winning streak</vocabulary>! You can expect <vocabulary>successive victories </vocabulary> in <vocabulary>consecutive championships</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out for <ja>は</ja> becoming <ja>ぱ</ja>.
